pkgmetadata.longdescription: One-Step Estimation // Provide principally an eponymic function that numerically computes the Le Cam one-step estimator which is asymptotically efficient (see e.g. L. Le Cam (1956) https://projecteuclid.org/euclid.bsmsp/1200501652) and can be computed faster than the maximum likelihood estimator for large observation samples.
